channel.title: Does anyone have tips to make [genre unknown]
channel.description: I love this song so much It’s like a mixture of future bass and something else but I’m not sure how to make it Melody and chord wise it’s extremely hard for me to make something like this https://soundcloud.com/zxnx/encoree If anyone can make melodies, chord progressions, drums and other things or give tips it would really help a lot Thanks in advance..

item.title: Does anyone have tips to make [genre unknown]
item.dc:creator: eohr
item.description:
Chord ideas:

Use major seventh or ninth chords (for the chords in this key that are major, except for the V chord).
Use minor seventh chords (for the chords in this key that are minor).
Use a VI7 chord to lead into a ii7 chord.
Use a I7 (dominant 7th) chord to lead into a IVmaj7 chord.

here are some examples:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/pJ1ayCK7emABfYRKO0f2gg==

you’ll find a lot of this stuff in conux or kayasho’s music

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have tips to make [genre unknown]

It’s like a mixture of future bass and something else but I’m not sure how to make it
